reviewText: GREAT footage.  I have a copy and gave one to my daughter for Christmas and she loves it, too.  It's beautifully filmed and put together in such a wonderful way.  It's one of those things that you'll watch over and over.
Really enjoyed. No problems, good packaging, no DVD issues.
Bad electric guitar music, and graphic statements. Watch David Attenborough instead for a majestic view of nature.
Fun to watch, bought it for my grandchildren
